definition: to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Some statistical features for each of these rainfall areas are analyzed and studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了每个降水区的统计特征。

sentences.english: An improved precipitation system is provided for the Bayer process production of alumina hydrate.
sentences.chinese: 改进的降水系统提供的氧化铝水合物拜耳法生产。

sentences.english: Temperature and precipitation levels have influenced many major events in history.
sentences.chinese: 气温和降水量对历史上的许多重大事件产生过影响。

sentences.english: It brings longer droughts between more intense periods of rain.
sentences.chinese: 干旱期会越来越长，而与其交叉的降水期则更加密集。

sentences.english: Frontogenesis and frontolysis have decisive effect on the precipitation near Meiyu front.
sentences.chinese: 锋生锋消对于梅雨锋附近有无降水起到了重要的作用。

sentences.english: The province normally averages slightly above 3 feet for an entire year.
sentences.chinese: 而该省的年平均降水量一般为3英尺。

sentences.english: The frequency of the tropical cyclone influencing Shenzhen has decreased, but its impact on heavy rainfall become more serious.
sentences.chinese: 影响深圳的热带气旋数量减少，但降水强度在加大。

sentences.english: The paper has adopted object function method and created optimization model of foundation ditch precipitation well cluster.
sentences.chinese: 采用目标函数法，建立基坑降水井群优化模型。

sentences.english: There is very little rain here, only 60mm in a year on average.
sentences.chinese: 这里降水很少，每年平均只有60毫米。

sentences.english: Remarkable results of increasing oil and decreasing water have been given by 6 field applications.
sentences.chinese: 现场试验了6口井，均取得了明显的增油降水效果。

sentences.english: This article briefly introduces construction dewatering in the san filled area for the Mawan Electric Power Plant project.
sentences.chinese: 本文对深圳妈湾电厂填砂区的施工降水作扼要介绍。

sentences.english: There is also a positive correlation between the autumn and spring precipitation and the yield of winter wheat in dry farmlands at 90% significant level.
sentences.chinese: 旱作区冬小麦产量与秋春季降水量呈较显著的正相关。

sentences.english: With the change of precipitation, it divided three pluvial periods and three dry periods.
sentences.chinese: 根据降水变化可分为三个多雨期和三个少雨期。

sentences.english: Moreover, the amplitude effect of city environment on rainfall also is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 此外还初步分析了城市环境对强降水的增幅作用。

sentences.english: It is one of the difficulties of mesoscale-numerical forecasting in rainfall.
sentences.chinese: 强降水预报是中尺度数值预报的难点之一。

sentences.english: But the moderate precipitation was unlikely to end the drought, experts said.
sentences.chinese: 但是，温和的降水是不可能结束的旱情，专家说。

definition: precipitation over a large area/widespread rain
the state of moisture in the soil (and whether it can support a crop)
